title: ninnai sharan adainden
sahitya: ninnai sharaN aDaindEn kaNNammA ninna sharaN aDaindencaraNam 1 ponnai uyarvaip pugazhai virumbiDum ennai kavalaigaL tinnat tagAdenru    caraNam 2  miDimaiyum accamumum Evi en nenjirkkuDimai pugundana konravai pOkkenru    caraNam 3  tan sheyaleNNit tavippadu tIrndingu nin sheyal sheidu niraivu perum vaNam    caraNam 4  tunbam iniyillai shOrvillai tOrpillai anbu neriyil arangaL vaLarttiDa    caraNam 5  nalladu tIyadu nAmariyOmannai nalladu nATTuga tImaiyai OTTuga
